WarLight: An online Risk clone

21 Oct 2011

Risk is a great strategic game in which you have to conquer the world.

Now I've found a clone called "Warlight": [caption id="attachment_6511" align="aligncenter" width="300" caption="Warlight"][/caption]

Go to the Game: WarLight on Kongregate Task: Conquer the world. How to play: Each turn you get armies depending on the number of countries / territories you controll. My Record: I could solve Level 1 - 3 and Europe.
